sub_title: Logistics Coordinator at Verathon Medical (Europe) B.V.
summary: Goal oriented, ambitious and hard working expert in the domain of Order Management and Order Review as well as Supply Chain and Logistics with focus on logistics coordination, Customs and Intrasta. Interested in warehouse management and processes improvement. Appreciate challenges and new opportunities, enjoying people coaching, project management and setting up procedures and process descriptions. Fast learner, moving easily in Oracle, SAP and SQL language base applications and systems. Skilled in public speaking in foreign language (English, French) as easily as in mother tongue (Polish). Always punctual, reliable and not afraid of taking responsibility and acting. Analytical thinker interested in word.
